venue.name: Chinatown Phillips Square

item.description:
Chinese New Year Parade 
Location: Chinatown - Phillips Square 
Date: Jan 29, 2012 Sunday 
Time: 10am-5pm
Cost: FREE

  • Parading all through chinatown all day
  • Follow one of the many clubs around as they parade from business to business
  • Come eat, stay, play!
item.how_to_find_us: I Will email those going witha location to meet, if I go or have someone else corordinate that if I do not make it and still email everyone going.
